structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ORGANIZATION AND GOVERNMENT OF CITIES OF THE SIXTH CLASS (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 29. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3693.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Compensation of clerk, treasurer, assessor and marshal.
